video.title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
video.synopsis: After a demon attack leaves his family slain and his sister cursed, Tanjiro embarks upon a perilous journey to find a cure and avenge those he's lost.

episodes.synopsis: After selling charcoal in town, Tanjiro returns home to find his whole family dead. Only his sister Nezuko has survived -- but sheâ€™s changed.
episodes.title: Cruelty

episodes.synopsis: Tanjiro departs for the mountains with Nezuko in tow. En route, he smells blood coming from inside a temple, where he stumbles upon a gruesome scene.
episodes.title: Trainer Sakonji Urokodaki

episodes.synopsis: Under Sakonji, Tanjiro trains to become a member of the Demon Slayer Corps. But before he can join, he'll have to qualify for the Final Selection.
episodes.title: Sabito and Makomo

episodes.synopsis: The Final Selection begins. Tanjiro and the other trainees must survive for seven days among demons trapped alive by Demon Slayer swordsmen.
episodes.title: Final Selection

episodes.synopsis: Tanjiro is among the four survivors of the Final Selection. After acquiring a new sword, he receives orders for his first mission as a Demon Slayer.
episodes.title: My Own Steel

episodes.synopsis: For his first mission, Tanjiro heads northwest to a village where he meets Kazumi, whose lover has disappeared without a trace.
episodes.title: Swordsman Accompanying a Demon

episodes.synopsis: Tanjiro dives into a swamp realm to confront a swamp demon who's split into three, but the demon refuses to tell him anything about Muzan Kibutsuji.
episodes.title: Muzan Kibutsuji

episodes.synopsis: For his next mission, Tanjiro heads to the bustling area of Asakusa, Tokyo to find the demon hiding among the crowds.
episodes.title: The Smell of Enchanting Blood

episodes.synopsis: While taking refuge inside a home concealed by Yushiro's spell, Tanjiro protects those inside from demons sent by Muzan Kibutsuji.
episodes.title: Temari Demon and Arrow Demon

episodes.synopsis: Nezuko goes toe-to-toe with Susamaru and her deadly volley of temari balls, but Tamayo intervenes with her own spell before the battle intensifies.
episodes.title: Together Forever

episodes.synopsis: Tanjiro travels south-southeast for his next mission. On the way, he encounters fellow swordsman and Final Selection survivor, Zenitsu Agatsuma.
episodes.title: Tsuzumi Mansion

episodes.synopsis: As Zenitsu cowers in fear inside a mysterious rotating house, Tanjiro faces a drum-beating demon and an odd sword-wielding man wearing a boar mask.
episodes.title: The Boar Bares Its Fangs, Zenitsu Sleeps

episodes.synopsis: With the house turning with each beat of the drum, an injured Tanjiro struggles against Kyogaiâ€™s overwhelming attack.
episodes.title: Something More Important Than Life

episodes.synopsis: Now outside the cursed drum house, Tanjiro finds a beaten and bloody Zenitsu, and is confronted by the belligerent man wearing a boar's head mask.
episodes.title: The House with the Wisteria Family Crest

episodes.synopsis: Tanjiro travels north-northeast with Inosuke and Zenitsu on their next mission. They reach Natagumo Mountain, where a spider horde resides.
episodes.title: Mount Natagumo

episodes.synopsis: With their fellow Demon Slayers under the demon spider's control, Tanjiro and Inosuke must figure a way to subdue their comrades without harming them.
episodes.title: Letting Someone Else Go First

episodes.synopsis: After facing the mother spider, Tanjiro learns of a demon under Muzan Kibutsuji's direct command who may hold the key to turning Nezuko back to human.
episodes.title: You Must Master a Single Thing

episodes.synopsis: While taking on the enraged father spider demon with Inosuke, Tanjiro is flung far away, where he confronts the spider demon, Rui.
episodes.title: A Forged Bond

episodes.synopsis: Giyu Tomioka, a top-ranked swordsman of the Demon Killing Corps, arrives. Outclassed and in awe of his skills, Inosuke challenges him to a duel.
episodes.title: Hinokami

episodes.synopsis: Tanjiro prepares for the worst when faced with Ruiâ€™s spell. But then, the memory of his father dancing the Kagura inspires him to unleash a new move.
episodes.title: Pretend Family

episodes.synopsis: Seeing a heavily injured Tanjiro still try to defend Nezuko, Rui is reminded of the one thing he craves and doesnâ€™t have: true family connection.
episodes.title: Against Corps Rules

episodes.synopsis: Tanjiro is dragged before a gathering of the Hashira, the most powerful of Demon Slayer Corps swordsmen, to face judgment.
episodes.title: Master of the Mansion

episodes.synopsis: Despite Ubuyashiki's decision to accept Tanjiro and Nezuko into the Corps, Sanemi tries to draw out Nezuko's demonic bloodthirst.
episodes.title: Hashira Meeting

episodes.synopsis: Tanjiro and other Corps members receive treatment at Shinobu's estate. Two weeks later, he and Inosuke begin training to rebuild their strength.
episodes.title: Rehabilitation Training

episodes.synopsis: Tanjiro trains hard to maintain Total Concentration Breathing all day long. Fearing getting left behind, Zenitsu and Inosuke start training again too.
episodes.title: Tsuguko, Kanao Tsuyuri

episodes.synopsis: Muzan Kibutsuji summons the lower ranks of demons and gives the sole survivor a task. Tanjiro's Kasugai Crow appears with his new mission.
episodes.title: New Mission
